price: Wala hamwezi kutaka ila atakapo Mwenyezi Mungu. Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu ni Mwenye ilimu, Mwenye hikima.
arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا
footnotes: Wala nyinyi hamwezi kutaka kitu chochote ila wakati anapo taka Mwenyezi Mungu. Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu ni Mwenye kuzijua hali zenu, Mwenye hikima kwa anayo yataka na akayakhiari.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā tashāūna illā an yashāa al-lahu inna al-laha kāna ʿalīman ḥakīman
